net.cassite.style

Class StyleRuntimeException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • java.lang.RuntimeException
          • net.cassite.style.StyleRuntimeException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class StyleRuntimeException
extends java.lang.RuntimeException
    A RuntimeException to simplify exception handling.
    it is recommended to create this exception using Style.$(Throwable)
    Author:
    wkgcass
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
